d.DBDAO

Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • d.DBDAO.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO

    implementation of CompanyDAO which enable to contact with the CouponDB database easily and safely.

    All connections to the database are given by the ConnectionPool, and then returned to it. No opening or closing of connections are made here.
